name: THE WITTLE PWINCE
description:
Once a upon a time, five fatigue colleagues decided to form a team and joined SEA GAME JAM 2021...

 THE WITTLE PWINCE  

Play as a prince collecting as many crowns as possible while fighting off enemies. While stacking your crowns, remember to keep your balance to avoid dropping them! Flex your muscles and tackle your enemies away to victory! 

(ノಠ益ಠ)ノ彡 Controls

Movement - WASD

Dash - LSHIFT / SPACE

Drop Crowns - F

Balancing - LMB / RMB

-----------------------------------------------------------

PIZZA MASTERS 4 : A NEW HOPE

Chan Zhe - Programmer, Systems

Jonathan Tang - Programmer, UI

Lee Yi - Programmer, AI

 Vanessa Ong - Environment and Level Artist

 Yee Cheng - Character Artist and Animator
